com.google.bitcoin.signers

Class StatelessTransactionSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.bitcoin.signers.StatelessTransactionSigner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionSigner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomTransactionSigner, DummySigSigner, LocalTransactionSigner

    public abstract class StatelessTransactionSigner
extends Object
implements TransactionSigner
    A signer that doesn't have any state to be serialized.
